example.code: Set-AASScheduledAction -ServiceNamespace AppStream -ResourceId fleet/MyFleet -Schedule "cron(0 0 8 ? * MON-FRI *)" -ScalableDimension appstream:fleet:DesiredCapacity -ScheduledActionName WeekDaysFleetScaling -ScalableTargetAction_MinCapacity 5 -ScalableTargetAction_MaxCapacity 10
example.description: This cmdlet creates or updates a scheduled action for an Application Auto Scaling scalable target. Each scalable target is identified by a service namespace, resource ID, and scalable dimension.
